slimefun_essentials.title: Slimefun Essentials
slimefun_essentials.config.option.block_:
-> Enables MBP Integration
-> Enables Jade Integration
slimefun_essentials.config.option.recipe:
-> Enables Jei Integration
-> Enables Rei Integration
-> Enables Emi Integration
slimefun_essentials.config.option.requir:
If Enabled Slimefun Essentials will not add any features on single player.
May require you to leave and rejoin the world to take effect.
slimefun_essentials.config.option.auto_t: Should Slimefun Essentials automatically Enable/Disable Addon Support?
slimefun_essentials.config.option.addons: Add/Remove Slimefun Addons you want Supported
slimefun_essentials.config.option.enable: Should Slimefun Essentials only function on Whitelisted Servers?
slimefun_essentials.config.option.server:
Add/Remove Server names you want Whitelisted
There is also a button in the edit server screen
slimefun_essentials.server_menu.add_whit: Add the Server to the Whitelist
slimefun_essentials.server_menu.remove_w: Remove the Server from the Whitelist
slimefun_essentials.recipes.label.day: This block must be exposed to the Sun to process this Recipe!
slimefun_essentials.recipes.label.night: This block must be exposed to the Moon to process this Recipe!
